response.original_title: Лайка никогда не вернется на Землю
response.overview: The story of Laika, the first dog in space. Dedicated to her 1957 flight aboard Sputnik-2, the film captures the Cold War atmosphere and the intense space race between the Soviet Union and the United States. Blending rare archival footage with AI-generated imagery, it offers a perspective on a pivotal moment in history—not only as a scientific milestone but also as a profoundly human story of sacrifice, ambition, and moral complexity. Laika Will Never Return to Earth invites viewers to reflect on the cost of progress and the forgotten lives behind grand achievements.
response.title: Laika Will Never Return to Earth

titles.title: Layka nikogda ne vernetsya na Zemlyu

release_dates.note: Message to Man International Film Festival
